name: Stickman Combat
description:
Stickman Combat is a mini project put together with Game Maker 8.  It was influenced by the Mortal Kombat series. The goal is to choose a character that suites you best and defeat the opposing fighters in a predetermined lineup.

Instructions: Choose your control type and navigate the menus with the left side of the control set and select with the right side. Example: Use WASD to navigate up left down right and use J and K to select the options.

Enjoy and Happy New Years!
